generated_doNotEdit.title: Hurt On Condition
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines a set of conditions under which an entity should take damage.

fields.title: Damage Conditions
fields.description: List of damage conditions that when met can cause damage to the entity.

subForm.description: List of damage conditions that when met can cause damage to the entity.

fields.title: Cause
fields.description: The kind of damage that is caused to the entity. Various armors and spells use this to determine if the entity is immune.

fields.title: Damage Per Tick
fields.description: The amount of damage done each tick that the conditions are met.

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: The set of conditions that must be satisfied before the entity takes the defined damage.
